channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Room for Conference Room for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Room for Conference Room for Windows

item.title: CVE-2022-28752|2024-08-03T06:03:52.479Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20room%20for%20conference%20room%20for%20windows
item.description: Zoom Rooms for Conference Rooms for Windows versions before 5.11.0 are susceptible to a Local Privilege Escalation vulnerability. A local low-privileged malicious user could exploit this vulnerability to escalate their privileges to the SYSTEM user.
